Remove Stopwords Report
=================================================================

Remove Stopwords found and remove stopwords from a text document

Note: This script depends on a R version 3.1 or later. If earlier version exists, please upgrade to the required version before use.

Input Columns: 'r colNames'

Results
```{r}
result
```
For more information, please refer to 'tm' pacakage documentation page http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tm/tm.pdf
